page.title: 16A STOCKPORT SUBURB
page.content: {Heaton Chapel}is a residential suburb lying between Stockport and Manchester. For all administration purposes it is controlled by{Stockport {Metropolitan Borough Council}and {Greater Manchester Council.}It developed along three main routes. The original road leading to the fording point of the{river Mersey,}the later {A6,}and finally, the Manchester to London{railway line. The area possesses many amenities, especially for{shopping.}As you walk through Heaton Chapel it soon becomes obvious that people make full use of the{open spaces}and take great pride in their{gardens and allotments.}Even so, from our survey of shopping and leisure activities, many people tavel by car, bus and train to use the {better}facilities in{other areas.
